name: pie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 a type of food made with meat, vegetables, or fruit covered in pastry and baked: Would you like some more steak pie? a pecan pie
Waldemar Blazej Nowak/EyeEm/GettyImages
US (also pizza pie) used to refer to a whole pizza, especially in the northeastern US: Their large pepperoni pie jumped 50 cents to $13.99. There is also take-and-bake pizza: the pie is assembled in a store or restaurant and sold uncooked.
Joff Lee/Photolibrary/GettyImages
